channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Urban Meyer on HC vacancies, Lincoln Riley & USC, Oregon | FULL INTERVIEW | The Herd
item.description: Urban Meyer joins Colin Cowherd to discuss whether LSU, Penn State, or Florida is the best head coach job, whether or not Lincoln Riley is on the hot-...

item.title: How Garth Brooks, The Killers And Tom Petty Became Stars of CFB Saturdays
item.description: Pep bands and fight songs still have their place, but now fans of some of the most prominent programs have embraced different stadium anthems.

item.title: Ex-NFL Star Antonio Brown Waives Extradition on Attempted Murder Charge
item.description: Antonio Brown will return to Florida after deciding not to contest his extradition from a New Jersey jail on an attempted murder charge.

item.title: Rams Replace Joshua Karty With Harrison 'The Thiccer Kicker' Mevis
item.description: The Los Angeles Rams are changing kickers and long snappers thanks to league-worst struggles.

item.title: Woodrow Lowe, Alabama Star Linebacker and 11-Year Chargers Defender, Dies at 71
item.description: Woodrow Lowe, a three-time All-American linebacker at Alabama and an 11-year starter for the NFLâ€™s San Diego Chargers, has died.

item.title: NCAA: Six hoops players banned for betting plots
item.description: Six former men's college basketball players at New Orleans, Mississippi Valley State and Arizona State participated in gambling schemes that included ...

item.title: How the Jets, trying to overturn years of misery, made franchise-altering moves in less than two hours
item.description: With much of the Jets organization at Nick Mangold's funeral, a pair of big trades were in the works 2 miles away.

item.title: Mark Sanchez won't return as Fox Sports analyst
item.description: Mark Sanchez will not return as a Fox Sports analyst as the former NFL quarterback faces trial stemming from his alleged attack on a truck driver last...

item.title: Rankings, contract projections for top 50 MLB free agents
item.description: How much will the biggest stars get paid this winter? Kiley McDaniel breaks down the class.
